pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.flavorText: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.flavorText: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.flavorText: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.flavorText: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.flavorText: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.flavorText: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.flavorText: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.flavorText: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.flavorText: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.flavorText: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.flavorText: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.flavorText: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.flavorText: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.flavorText: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.flavorText: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.flavorText: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.flavorText: A ferocious, pre­ historic POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.flavorText: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.flavorText: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.flavorText: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.flavorText: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.flavorText: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.flavorText: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.flavorText: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.flavorText: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
